description.@en: A bolt of writhing black energy unerringly strikes out, twisting its way down the throat and orifices of those who have pledged themselves to the Abyss.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe immediately suffers [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage. If it strikes a foe who is classified as Abyssal or is an occultist to any one of the Daemonic Princes, they must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or be set On Fire as well.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe is automatically set On Fire.

criticalFailure.@en: Crushing pain wracks your body, as writhing black tendrils penetrate you from stem to stern. You immediately suffer Damage as above and an equal amount of Peril as well.

reagents.@en: A pinch of bitumen, crushed beneath heel (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can see
